Detailed Description

An iterator over the uncovered Boxes in a hierarhcy.

This iterator points to a pair consisting of the current uncovered Box and the Patch with which it is associated. Note that in the case of overlapping Patches in which the overlap is uncovered, the overlapping region will appear multiple times in the iteration. The number of appearances is equal to the number of Patches that overlap that region.
